data.message: My account has been hacked. I'm writing this from my mothers facebook. It will not give me a code sent to my phone or correct email address (email has been changed by the hacker) I cannot get onto my account and I desperately need to as I have contacts needed for work. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE HAVE SOMEONE HELP ME!!'

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Amber.  If your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2smUGt8. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure on Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2rky25q. -William

I have already tried all of that. I cannot log into my facebook at all. I need the company to send me a code to reset my password.. I have requested this many times and it hasn't been sent to my phone or correct email. I need help to resolve this asap
It keeps sending me to the "secured friends" thing to ask friends to get a code but it won't tell me who my trusted friends are and keeps rejecting all family members. very frustrated.

Hi Amber. You may be able to get back into your Facebook account by answering a security question or using an alternate email address listed on your account. Keep in mind that you'll only see these options if you set them up. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2qAKOQ2. You might also try these troubleshooting tips for getting help from your trusted contacts: http://bit.ly/2rUX2D8. -William

That's not working either! PLEASE get me to someone who can help me!!!!! I've been through all of these steps. It won't recognize my other email the hackers changed everything! I need a code sent to my phone or CORRECT email address please!
Facebook please help me resolve this!!
Facebook Hey William, how about all the other folks who are begging for help?  What are people supposed to do?  Help pages and links don't work. 7 open cases and no resolution.
